Title: P-2 PILOT COMPARTMENT
description: Roll 2D per shell hit on Pilot Compartment

2.description: Roll for damage on Table BL-2 Instruments

4.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

5.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

8.description: Roll for wound on Table BL-4

9.description: Intercom system out. Mission may be aborted
notes: All gunners now must roll a 6 to hit attacking fighters except Tail gunners which hit on 5 or 6
See rules section Aborting the Mission

10.description: Drop out of formation to 10,000 feet in next zone
notes: See rules sections Oxygen Out and Out of Formation

11.description: Windshield knocked out - pilot compartment heat out

12.description: Roll 1D: 1-3 = Ailerons inoperable, landing roll -1; 4 = Elevators inoperable, landing roll -1; 5 = Rudder inoperable, landing roll -1; 6 = All control surfaces inoperable, crew must immediately bailout on Table G-6

sub_roll.1-3: Ailerons inoperable - landing roll on Tables G-9 or G-10 -1
sub_roll.4: Elevators inoperable - landing roll on Tables G-9 or G-10 -1
sub_roll.5: Rudder inoperable - landing roll on Tables G-9 or G-10 -1
sub_roll.6: All control surfaces inoperable - crew must immediately bailout on Table G-6

notes: See rules sections for Oxygen Out, Heat Out/Frostbite, and Aborting the Mission
Intercom system out causes all gunners to hit only on 6, except Tail gunners on 5-6
